comments.comment: cricket gana melo deyak danne nathuwa katha karanna epa.meka game ekak.....nathuwa yuddayak nemei..cricket gahanneth api wagema minissu.......e minnsu patta kapa kireemak karala othanata gihin thiyenne.nathuwa athall eke beela kala nidiyagena nemeii...e minissu horakam karala nemei jeewath wenne.....garu karanna ona minissunta garu karahann......e minissuntath daruwo innawa...demapiyo inmawa...mewa dakkama kochchara dukwenawada...yakoo kondak pana tiyenawanam rate duushitha deshapalanachchayange poto tikak gini tiyahan...........buddimath weyahan..mathiws thama avr. eka 40 pannala tiyena ekama bastmen.....mulin ena bastmanla hariyata bat karanne nathi nisa eka hira wenawa....match paradina ekata duk wela wadak na....anika meka game ekak.......duka sathuta dekama vida daragamu..nathiwa me minissunta baninna epa....
comments.author: pahan shami

Matches blpn gihin.. scoreboard eke lakunu wgema balls gaanath blhn... mathewsge ss naha ekakawath.. balls 100ta lakunu 60k gahana ODI player knkgen athi wade mkkda oi.. üòÇüòÇ pake logic.. match eke scoreboard withrk palana mathewsta puka dena ponziyo tika.. balls kaala 50k gahala thawa ekkwa runout krala average eka hadagena out wela ynwa.. 

Oya average eka hari nm dekata bedahan.. mkda mathews krana runout ekk baluwama oka dekata bedenna epai.. ethkota mathewsge average 20y üòÇüòÇ anika mathewsge 2015 idn SS eka oneday wala 60k wge thiyenneth.. ss 60 thiyena one day player knk inna eka ratatama wasanawak.. mkk unath average 40y neh.. üòÇüòÇ pake logic.. thawa puka dipn..
